venue.name: The Kinsale Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Let's toast the official start of winter.... I know it's cold, you know it's cold but you also know that is what happens at this time of year here.....it gets cold. So let's huddle around the Kinsale bar.

Patrick, one of our trivia royalty, has given the Kinsale his stamp of approval, another reason to drop in.

I'll arrive by 5 and stay until 8....maybe longer.
Get there when you can and hang as long as you're able.
Don't be shy...Say hi, to the friendly folks gathered at the bar.

Check out http://mbta.com/... or http://www.hopstop.co... to create your route by public transit. Government Center (blue & green lines), State (orange & blue lines), Aquarium (blue line) and South Station (red line & commuter rail). These subway stations are no more than a fifteen (15) minute walk.

If you come thirsty here's the beverage menu and/or hungry here's the food menu

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Friendly folks huddled at the bar
item.name: Winter Solstice Happy Hour Monday December 21st
